titles.title: Sexual Harrassment and Reporting and Posting Act of 2004

To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to require institutions of higher education to widely distribute information describing their procedures for receiving and responding to complaints concerning harassment.

bill.summary: Sexual Harassment Reporting and Posting Act of 2004 - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 (HEA) to require institutions of higher education that participate in any HEA student aid program to disseminate to prospective and enrolled students information describing procedures for receiving and responding to complaints of sexual harassment.
